name: picossg
description: The pico static side generator, the simplest one I ever wanted and hopefully 'found'.

scripts.test: npx nodemon --quiet --legacy-watch --watch dist --watch expected-dist --watch build.js --ext '*' --exec "bash -c 'diff -ru dist expected-dist > /tmp/diffout; cat /tmp/diffout | diffstat; if [ -s /tmp/diffout ]; then echo ❌ Differences found; else echo ✅ OK; fi'"

author: Wolfram Kriesing
